result.arabic_text: هَٰذَا خَلۡقُ ٱللَّهِ فَأَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ بَلِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
result.translation: Ehe nimurabe rero ivyaremwe n’Imana Allah! Babangikanyamana! Enda nyabuna rero, nimunyereke ivyaremwe n’ibigirwamana musenga mu gishingo c’Imana Allah! Ahubwo abirenganije mw’ibangikanyamana, bari mu buhuvyi bugaragara buri kure cane y’ukuri.
